publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6176 Angela Constance: Congratulations to the Senior Wind Band of James Young High School, Livingston—That the Parliament congratulates the Senior Wind Band of James Young High School in Livingston for its recent success at the National Concert Band Festival finals in Birmingham; commends the band for its hard work and practice that won it the Gold Award accolade, and recognises Principal Teacher of the music department Brian Dobson for his valuable contribution to the success of the band and his work with the school’s talented young pupils.

S3M-6176 Congratulations to the Senior Wind Band of James Young High School, Livingston (lodged on 21 April 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Aileen Campbell*, Sandra White*, Rob Gibson*, Hugh Henry*
